DOM2DDS

public static void DOM2DDS(org.w3c.dom.Node node,
                           dods.dap.Server.ServerDDS dds,
                           java.lang.String variables)
Converts a Document to a DDS object with specified variables

Parameters:
node - the document node used to generate DDS object.
dds - the generated DDS object.
variables - the list of variables that should be in the dds. It is a string of comma-separated or space-separated variables. If null, all variables should be in the DDS.

DOM2DAS

public static void DOM2DAS(org.w3c.dom.Node node,
                           dods.dap.DAS das,
                           java.lang.String variables)
Generates a DAS object from a xml node with specified variables

Parameters:
node - the input XML node
das - the output DAS object
variables - the specified variables that should be in the DAS. It is a string with comma-separated or space-separated variables. If null, all variables should be in the DAS.

Parameters:
